title: Exercise for the Brain
teaser: Physical activity is good for learning. Yet many schools cut back on gym class and even cracking down on fidgeting. […]
description: Physical activity is good for learning. Yet many schools cut back on gym class and even cracking down on fidgeting. […]
contentencoded:
Physical activity is good for learning. Yet many schools cut back on gym class and even cracking down on fidgeting. A professor of kinesiology explains why growing brains need physical exercise.


Guest: Charles Hillman, Professor of Kinesiology at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.
